meanings.definition: The quality or state of being skinny.
meanings.sent1: Her skinniness made her clothes look too big on her.
meanings.sent2: The skinniness of the model made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: Despite her skinniness, she could eat a whole pizza by herself.
meanings.sent4: The skinniness of the tree branches made them sway in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The skinniness of the thread made it perfect for delicate embroidery.

meanings.definition: A thin or slender physical appearance.
meanings.sent1: The skinniness of the cat allowed it to squeeze through the narrow gap.
meanings.sent2: Her skinniness was admired by many in the fashion industry.
meanings.sent3: The skinniness of the pencil made it easy to hold for long periods.
meanings.sent4: The skinniness of the road made it challenging to drive on during the storm.
meanings.sent5: The skinniness of the rope made it ideal for climbing up the tree.
